verses.verse: Then <WH227> Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> the Reubenites, <WH7206> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519>

And said <WH559> to them, You have kept <WH8104> all <WH3605> that Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> you, and have obeyed <WH8085> my voice <WH6963> in all <WH3605> that I commanded <WH6680> you:

You have not left <WH5800> your brothers <WH251> these <WH428> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> to this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> but have kept <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the commandment <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

And now <WH6258> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given rest <WH5117> to your brothers, <WH251> as he promised <WH1696> them: therefore now <WH6258> return <WH6437> you, and get <WH3212> you to your tents, <WH168> and to the land <WH776> of your possession, <WH272> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> you on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> Jordan. <WH3383>

But take diligent <WH3966> heed <WH8104> to do <WH6213> the commandment <WH4687> and the law, <WH8451> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> charged <WH6680> you, to love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and to walk <WH3212> in all <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> and to keep <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> and to hold <WH1692> to him, and to serve <WH5647> him with all <WH3605> your heart <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> your soul. <WH5315>
So Joshua <WH3091> blessed <WH1288> them, and sent <WH7971> them away: and they went <WH3212> to their tents. <WH168>

Now to the one half <WH2677> of the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> Moses <WH4872> had given <WH5414> possession in Bashan: <WH1316> but to the other half <WH2677> thereof gave <WH5414> Joshua <WH3091> among <WH5973> their brothers <WH251> on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> westward. <WH3220> And when <WH3588> Joshua <WH3091> sent <WH7971> them away also <WH1571> to their tents, <WH168> then he blessed <WH1288> them,

And he spoke <WH559> to them, saying, <WH559> Return <WH7725> with much <WH7227> riches <WH5233> to your tents, <WH168> and with very <WH3966> much <WH7227> cattle, <WH4735> with silver, <WH3701> and with gold, <WH2091> and with brass, <WH5178> and with iron, <WH1270> and with very <WH3966> much <WH7235> raiment: <WH8008> divide <WH2505> the spoil <WH7998> of your enemies <WH341> with your brothers. <WH251>

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> returned, <WH7725> and departed <WH3212> from the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of Shiloh, <WH7887> which <WH834> is in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> to go <WH3212> to the country <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> to the land <WH776> of their possession, <WH272> whereof <WH834> they were possessed, <WH270> according <WH5921> to the word <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

And when they came <WH935> to the borders <WH1552> of Jordan, <WH3383> that are in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> built <WH1129> there <WH8033> an altar <WH4196> by Jordan, <WH3383> a great <WH1419> altar <WH4196> to see <WH4758> to.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> say, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> have built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> over <WH413> <WH4136> against <WH4136> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> in the borders <WH1552> of Jordan, <WH3383> at <WH413> the passage <WH5676> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And when the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> of it, the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gathered <WH6950> themselves together at Shiloh, <WH7887> to go <WH5927> up to war <WH6635> against <WH5921> them.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> sent <WH7971> to the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and to the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> Phinehas <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548>

And with him ten <WH6235> princes, <WH5387> of each <WH259> chief <WH1> house <WH1004> a prince <WH5387> throughout all <WH3605> the tribes <WH4294> of Israel; <WH3478> and each one <WH376> was an head <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1> among the thousands <WH505> of Israel. <WH3478>

And they came <WH935> to the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and to the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> to the land <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> and they spoke <WH1696> with them, saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> of the LORD, <WH3068> What <WH4100> trespass <WH4604> is this <WH2088> that you have committed <WH4603> against the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> to turn <WH7725> away this day <WH3117> from following <WH310> the LORD, <WH3068> in that you have built <WH1129> you an altar, <WH4196> that you might rebel <WH4775> this day <WH3117> against the LORD? <WH3068>

Is the iniquity <WH5771> of Peor <WH6465> too little <WH4592> for us, from which <WH834> we are not cleansed <WH2891> until <WH5704> this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> although there was a plague <WH5063> in the congregation <WH5712> of the LORD, <WH3068>

But that you must turn <WH7725> away this day <WH3117> from following <WH310> the LORD? <WH3068> and it will be, seeing you rebel <WH4775> to day <WH3117> against the LORD, <WH3068> that to morrow <WH4279> he will be wroth <WH7107> with the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> of Israel. <WH3478>

Notwithstanding, <WH389> if <WH518> the land <WH776> of your possession <WH272> be unclean, <WH2931> then pass <WH5674> you over <WH5674> to the land <WH776> of the possession <WH272> of the LORD, <WH3068> wherein <WH834> <WH8033> the LORD's <WH3068> tabernacle <WH4908> dwells, <WH7931> and take <WH270> possession <WH270> among <WH8432> us: but rebel <WH4775> not against the LORD, <WH3068> nor <WH408> rebel <WH4775> against us, in building <WH1129> you an altar <WH4196> beside <WH1107> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>

Did not Achan <WH5912> the son <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> commit <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> in the accursed <WH2764> thing, and wrath <WH7110> fell <WH1961> on <WH5921> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of Israel? <WH3478> and that man <WH376> perished <WH1478> not alone <WH259> in his iniquity. <WH5771>

Then the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> answered, <WH6030> and said <WH1696> to the heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Israel, <WH3478>

The LORD <WH3068> God <WH410> of gods, <WH430> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH410> of gods, <WH430> he knows, <WH3045> and Israel <WH3478> he shall know; <WH3045> if <WH518> it be in rebellion, <WH4777> or if <WH518> in transgression <WH4604> against the LORD, <WH3068> (save <WH3467> us not this <WH2088> day, <WH3117>)

That we have built <WH1129> us an altar <WH4196> to turn <WH7725> from following <WH310> the LORD, <WH3068> or if <WH518> to offer <WH5927> thereon <WH5921> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH4503>or meat offering, or if <WH518> to offer <WH6213> peace <WH8002> offerings <WH2077> thereon, <WH5921> let the LORD <WH3068> himself require <WH1245> it;

And if <WH518> we have not rather done <WH6213> it for fear <WH1674> of this <WH2063> thing, <WH1697> saying, <WH559> In time <WH4279> to come <WH4279> your children <WH1121> might speak <WH559> to our children, <WH1121> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> have you to do with the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel? <WH3478>

For the LORD <WH3068> has made <WH5414> Jordan <WH3383> a border <WH1366> between <WH996> us and you, you children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and children <WH1121> of Gad; <WH1410> you have no <WH369> part <WH2506> in the LORD: <WH3068> so shall your children <WH1121> make our children <WH1121> cease <WH7673> from fearing <WH3372> the LORD. <WH3068>
Therefore we said, <WH559> Let us now <WH4994> prepare <WH6213> to build <WH1129> us an altar, <WH4196> not for burnt <WH5930> offering, nor <WH3808> for sacrifice: <WH2077>

But that it may be a witness <WH5707> between <WH996> us, and you, and our generations <WH1755> after <WH310> us, that we might do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the LORD <WH3068> before <WH6440> him with our burnt <WH5930> offerings, and with our sacrifices, <WH2077> and with our peace <WH8002> offerings; that your children <WH1121> may not say <WH559> to our children <WH1121> in time <WH4279> to come, <WH4279> You have no <WH369> part <WH2506> in the LORD. <WH3068>

Therefore said <WH559> we, that it shall be, when <WH3588> they should so say <WH559> to us or to our generations <WH1755> in time <WH4279> to come, <WH4279> that we may say <WH559> again, Behold <WH7200> the pattern <WH8403> of the altar <WH4196> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> our fathers <WH1> made, <WH6213> not for burnt <WH5930> offerings, nor <WH3808> for sacrifices; <WH2077> but it is a witness <WH5707> between <WH996> us and you.

God forbid <WH2486> that we should rebel <WH4775> against the LORD, <WH3068> and turn <WH7725> this day <WH3117> from following <WH310> the LORD, <WH3068> to build <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> for burnt <WH5930> offerings, <WH4503> for meat offerings, or for sacrifices, <WH2077> beside <WH905> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> that is before <WH6440> his tabernacle. <WH4908>

And when Phinehas <WH6372> the priest, <WH3548> and the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> and heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Israel <WH3478> which <WH834> were with him, heard <WH8085> the words <WH1697> that the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> spoke, <WH1696> it pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> them.

And Phinehas <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> said <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and to the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> and to the children <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> This day <WH3117> we perceive <WH3045> that the LORD <WH3068> is among <WH8432> us, because <WH834> you have not committed <WH4603> this <WH2088> trespass <WH4604> against the LORD: <WH3068> now <WH227> you have delivered <WH5337> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the hand <WH3027> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And Phinehas <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and the princes, <WH5387> returned <WH7725> from the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and from the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> out of the land <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> to the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and brought <WH7725> them word <WH1697> again. <WH7725>

And the thing <WH1697> pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> blessed <WH1288> God, <WH430> and did not intend <WH559> to go <WH5927> up against <WH5921> them in battle, <WH6635> to destroy <WH7843> the land <WH776> wherein <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and Gad <WH1410> dwelled. <WH3427>

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> called <WH7121> the altar <WH4196> Ed: <WH5707> for it shall be a witness <WH5707> between <WH996> us that the LORD <WH3068> is God. <WH430>
